description: Our fastest reacting Transitions Light Intelligent Lenses automatically adjust from clear to dark depending on the intensity of the sun. They block 100% of UVA/B light, and help protect against harmful blue light from digital devices and the sun.

Transitions XTRActive lenses go extra dark outdoors and also darken when behind car windscreens to protect your eyes while driving. Ideal for the most light-sensitive people, they block 100% of UV light and help protect against harmful blue light.
